Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Set toggle value. Change using msg.payload.

Change using msg.enabled.

Change using msg.color.

Value sent when switched on. Change using msg.on_value.

Value sent when switched off. Change using msg.off_value.

Display current value. Change using msg.show_value.
